participants.name: Kelsey Cvach
participants.description: Digital Content Producer at U.S. Department of State

messages.message: Hey so are you coming to HI?

Brian
HI!
what's that?
the ski trip?
Yes.  I would like to.  I wasn't sure if a lot of people are going or if this is a Teresa and Joe thing.

Brian
the ski trip?
Yes.  I would like to.  I wasn't sure if a lot of people are going or if this is a Teresa and Joe thing.
No, Hawaii, Teresa, Joe, David, Erin, me, and possibly Travis are going

Brian
when?

Feb 1 thru 7th. It's less than 400$ round trip
We might leave on Feb 3rd, that way people don't miss too much class/work

Brian
oh, that sounds awesome.
what island?

Oahu!
that has the capital and is one of the prettiest islands
we were thinking camping for several nights, which would be 4$ a night per person, and then splitting a cheap hotel room for the week nights

Brian
and transportation?
oahu has a really good bus system that goes literally everywhere, says a friend who lived in oahu her entire life

Brian
oh wow.
hmm, I am not sure, my dad wants to take a ski trip and the thing in January, I just don't think I can get that many days off.

yup. it's $2.50 a ride tho, but that's waaaaay cheaper than having to get a rental car.
So, are you down?
and, would you prefer to leave mid week on the 31st or on Friday the 3rd?

Brian
I could do the weekend, but that is a lot of airtime for 4 days.
so you would prefer the 31st?

Brian
yeah, but again, the days off might be a problem.  so probably don't include me in the decision.
gotchya

Brian
MiM0SA tonight?
sure, that's in flagstaff right?

Brian
yup
and how much is it?

Brian
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3GlLXgyEbAw
I think 25 at the door, but I usually just talk them down.
Last night there was a guy selling tickets right next to the girl charging to get in to the bar.
He came over and asked me how much money I have, and I said $4 and he said close enough and let me in.
I already bought my tickets for tonight too so I don't feel so bad.

what?? that's awesome
yeah i'm down

Brian
you generally just have to ask.

alright sounds good
going to try and call teresa
see you tonight

Brian
ok! see ya.
hey! what's up?

Brian
hi

Brian
Hello!
Can you do me a favor?
I am playing a game.  Can you send Joe Flieger a compliment?

Sure
Now?

Brian
Yes!  Finally!  Someone, asap would be funnier.
I already sent him something nice.
I'll send you what he says about it.
Nice profile pick btw.  I appreciate your daring.  Always have.
Thank you!!

Brian
woah dude, heart felt!  Nice job.
How have you been btw?

Brian
Ups and downs.  Got laid off.  Got a bunch of job offers too, thank you for checking in.
How are you?

Brian
Can I talk to you about Jesus?

Sorry for spotty answers, I'm actually in london right now!
Exciting about those job offers
Teresa is probably the better one at the moment for a Jesus conversation because of my scant wifi access

Brian
London is awesome!  Have fun!
